archiveClassifier.set(null) // makes it Eloise.jar instead of Eloise-all.jar
Eloise is a **personal task manager chatbot**.
It helps you keep track of todos, deadlines, and events in a conversational way.
Use keywords such as 'todo', 'deadline' and 'event' to add your tasks!
Use 'mark' or 'unmark' to check your tasks off after you're done!
Use 'list' to look at all your current tasks,
and 'sort' to sort them into alphabetical
1. Download the latest release from the [releases page](https://github.com/jing-xiang-choong/eloise/releases).

* Represents a command that sorts tasks in the {@link TaskList}.
* Supports sorting by description (alphabetical order) or by date
* (chronological order of deadlines/events). Tasks without dates are placed
* after tasks with dates when sorting by date.
* Creates a {@code SortCommand} with the given criteria.
* Defaults to sorting by description if {@code criteria} is null.
* @param criteria the sort criteria, either "desc" or "date"
